text:
Serie A
Inter Milan - Lukaku: "Thank you all"
Having arrived at Inter Milan this summer, Belgian striker Romelu Lukaku seems to have adapted himself perfectly to his new club thanks to his teammates.
01 Nov 2019, 08:40 by Florian Sermaise



After two failures in C1 and C3, the Nerazzurri will try to do better for the coming season. The arrival of Antonio Conte is also synonymous with a new philosophy of play.Icon Sport



Samir HandanovicIcon Sport



Milan SkriniarIcon Sport



Stefan from VrijIcon Sport



Diego GodinIcon Sport



Kwadwo AsamoahIcon Sport



Nicolo BarellaIcon Sport



Radja NainggolanIcon Sport



Marcelo BrozovicIcon Sport



Valentino LazaroIcon Sport



Ivan PerisicIcon Sport



Lautaro MartinezIcon Sport

Inter Milan: the possible eleven of the season

Romelu Lukaku seems perfect to have adapted to Inter Milan. Landed this summer in the Lombard club, against a check of 65 million euros, the Belgian striker quickly found his marks, evidenced by his 7 goals scored 10 games of Serie A disputed. An adaptation that he owes a lot to his new teammates according to him.




"This group is special"




Romelu Lukaku and Antonio Conte + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

According to RMC Sport, the former Manchester United striker invited his partners to the restaurant on Thursday night. The day after the victory of the Interiors on the lawn of Brescia (1-2), the sturdy forward center was keen to thank them for its successful acclimation. "Thank you all for your presence, I'm very happy to be with you, thank you for your help, this group is special," he said in Italian, adding: "Thank you again for all you have done for me, and to help me adapt to Italy so quickly." If that's not a statement, it looks like a lot!
